mapper.select: select * from notice n join member m on n.member_id = m.member_id
select b.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from notice order by 1 desc) a where rownum <= #{page} * 10 ) b where b.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 10
mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_id, member_id, notice_title, notice_content, write_date) values(notice_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, sysDate )
mapper.update: update notice set notice_views=notice_views+1 where notice_id=#{noticeId}
